pollHash.description: hash of the poll associated with this shard.

genesisBlockHash.description: a hash of the genesis block for this shard.

peers.description: an array of peers that this shard is aware of

localChainLength.description: the number of blocks stored in the chain associated with this shard locally

localRespPoolSize.description: the size of the response pool maintained locally associated with this shard

localLastUpdateTimestamp.description: a UNIX timestamp representing the last time this shard was updated

localOpMining.description: is this client currently mining this shard?
